segments.text: I hear Jean married a business tycoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . Her husband is a fat cat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I don't think she really loves him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is only after his money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I were her , I wouldn't marry a man I don't really love .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But many girls nowaday do want to marry a man filthy with dough .
segments.speaker: S2
